dmca.title: DCMA compaint
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Francis [mailto:francis@vanbeveren.eu] 
Sent: Sunday, December 03, 2006 9:49 AM
To: dmca@ev1.net
Subject: DCMA compaint


This is my DCMA complaint. 
 
Identification of the copyrighted work:
http://www.spellenlog.nl
http://www.spellenlog.nl/img/2/gamelh.gif
http://www.spellenlog.nl/img/2/mainback.gif
http://www.spellenlog.nl/img/2/mainbloktop.gif
http://www.spellenlog.nl/img/2/gametopb.jpg
http://www.spellenlog.nl/actie-spellen/
http://www.spellenlog.nl/2.css
http://www.spellenlog.nl/actie-spellen/1639-acid-factory.html
http://www.spellenlog.nl/actie-spellen/1639-acid-factory.html
 
Specific links to pages/files which are infringing (some samples): 
http://www.oyunzevki.com/
http://www.oyunzevki.com/img/2/gamelh.gif
http://www.oyunzevki.com/img/2/mainback.gif
http://www.oyunzevki.com/img/2/mainbloktop.gif
http://www.oyunzevki.com/img/2/gametopb.jpg
http://www.oyunzevki.com/aksiyon.php
http://www.oyunzevki.com/2.css
http://www.oyunzevki.com/game.php?gId=21479
http://www.oyunzevki.com/play.php?gId=21479

 
My contact information: 
F.C.A. van Beveren 
Stadsmolen 22 
3146 CC Maassluis 
Netherlands 
email: francis@vanbeveren.eu 
Telephone: +31 (0)6 4221 0945 
 
I, F.C.A. van Beveren, the complaining party has a goof faith belief
that use of the material in the manner complained of is not authorized
by me, the copyright owner. This is the 5th time that he does this!
 
I, F.C.A. van Beveren, make a statement that the information in the
notification is accurate, and under penalty of perjury, that the
complaining party is authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an
exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
